boot.select-language: Select Language / 选择系统语言

app.name: Online Music Toolbox
app.description: Free, fast, and secure audio processing tools. Supports format conversion, audio trimming, sound effects, and more, making audio processing simple and efficient

converter.title: Format Conversion
converter.description: Support for mutual conversion between MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC and other audio formats with high-quality lossless conversion

trimmer.title: Audio Trimming
trimmer.description: Visual waveform editing, precise audio segment cutting, support for real-time preview and export

effects.title: Sound Effects
effects.description: Professional effects such as reverb, echo, noise reduction, bass enhancement to improve audio quality

separator.title: Vocal Separation (AI)
separator.description: Separate vocals and accompaniment based on AI algorithms, supporting separate download of tracks

volume.title: Volume Adjustment
volume.description: Precise audio volume adjustment with real-time waveform visualization, support for batch processing

merger.title: Audio Merger
merger.description: Merge multiple audio files, support for adjusting order, real-time preview of merge effects

video-separator.title: Video Separation
video-separator.description: Extract audio from video, support for multiple video formats, high-quality audio output

recorder.title: Recording Studio
recorder.description: High-quality recording function with real-time waveform display, support for pause, resume and download

ai-audio.title: AI Audio Lab
ai-audio.description: Integrated Whisper transcription, AI voice enhancement, deep noise reduction and other cutting-edge technologies

labels.draggable-hint: Drag and drop audio files here
labels.or-click-hint: Or click to select files to upload
labels.supported-formats: Supports MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC, M4A, WMA, WebM and other formats

features.description: All audio processing tools currently supported by the system

about.title: Project Introduction
about.description: AudioConvert is a professional online audio processing tool dedicated to providing a minimalist and efficient audio transcoding and editing experience. We use the latest Web technology to ensure all operations are completed in the local browser, protecting your privacy.
about.author: Author

donate.title: Support Our Development
donate.description: If you find this tool helpful, you are welcome to buy the author a cup of coffee. Your support is the driving force for our continuous maintenance.

recorder.title: Recording Studio
recorder.description: High-quality recording with real-time waveform display

permission.title: Microphone Permission Required
permission.description: The recording studio needs access to your microphone device

separator.description: AI intelligent separation of vocals and accompaniment in audio
